nodes.text: Charles Howerton (born June 24, 1938) is an actor and voice-over artist. Howerton voiced Owen Lars in Episode IV: A New Hope Read-Along Storybook and CD.

Howerton is an accomplished actor who has starred in numerous television productions since 1965. He has worked in television dramas and comedies including several roles in the 1970s series Spectreman and an F.B.I. agent in My Name is Earl. His voice work has included a recurring role as both Kip Hawkes Sr. and Jr. on A.T.O.M.: Alpha Teens on Machines and a Norwegian professor on The Sylvester and Tweety Mysteries, a spin-off of Looney Tunes.
